website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Epic React Flyknit seemed to be a successful release, but not quite. Although many runners praised the shoe’s comfort level, durability, and weight, there were some who were dissatisfied with the fit and support. In terms of performance, the shoe received both raves and rants. Thus, it could be said that the Epic React Flyknit is an average running shoe; not perfect, but worth a try and worth the investment.
pros: The Nike Epic React Flyknit was a comfortable shoe right out of the box, several users exclaimed
Other runners expressed how comfortable the shoe is: some compared it to running on pillows and clouds, while another voiced comfort even on the knees
The outsole was surprisingly durable, wrote a commenter
The lightweight disposition helped increase running speed, a couple of reviewers observed
A lot of wearers said that the Epic React Flyknit was a good-looking shoe
Some runners were pleased with how responsive the midsole was
One tester liked that the Flyknit upper was snug and structured
There was just the right amount of cushioning: not too soft and not too firm, explained a reviewer
The shoe allowed natural movement, even during fast-paced activities, commended a buyer
The Epic React Flyknit was an excellent shoe for up-tempo days and speedy runs, a reviewer claimed
cons: The shoe had a narrow fit, according to a couple of purchasers
Several customers experienced a weird popping noise from the shoe that was quite bothersome
Not much support for midfoot strikers, a disappointed user stated
Although lightweight, the shoe’s structure made it look bulky, a reviewer thought
Some users disliked that the shoe required a break-in period
A bit tight around the forefoot, according to numerous customers
The Epic React Flyknit did not have a lot of grip on indoor surfaces, said a runner
The heel counter was too rigid, especially during the first few wears, a wearer mentioned

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented Color
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is really great but very disappointed in the color. You can see in the pictures I attached that the shoe that came in the mail looks much different than the grey one from the website. They are comfy and feel great but color is something that's important to me. Not what I expect from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: christine risavi

customer_reviews.title: Correction, I have the MEN's shoes, not the Women's.
customer_reviews.text: I needed good volleyball shoes that works on various types of gym courts. These have a good grip to them, and they are very light and comfortable. I wear 11.5 and the fit is good. Putting them on is a little snug, but the fabric is stretchy and so far, the stretching hasn't lost its form.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Men’s sizes. Not women’s!
customer_reviews.text: These are men’s, not women’s. The part that goes around your ankle is rough and could cause a blister if you don’t have proper socks. Love the color and look. They do run small but I had to buy a whole size bigger to get a pair since they were in men’s sizes.
customer_reviews.author: 2 over 50lb pullers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for flat foot
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid shoe, this is my 4th color way in the same style because of its comfortability. Seller sent the shoe that was displayed and arrived as expected.
customer_reviews.author: zuhair

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sought these out because they were highly rated running shoes, but I didn't want to pay an extra 50 bucks for different colors; managed to snag these and have recieved lots of compliments. Very springy soles, lots of breathability. Overall great shoe so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I’ve owned , but it’s coming apart after 4 months & 5 washings
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Daigrepont

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I am living in Bellevue, WA. Ordered this product on last month. This is product is too tight. Also color of this product is not matching with picture. Now, I would like to return this item, they are saying I have to deliver the item to Vancouver city and I have to pay the delivery charges. This is an extra headache.
customer_reviews.author: Bidhan Deb

customer_reviews.title: New School Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, feels good, hopefully it holds up for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Check description!
customer_reviews.text: Even though the description says Women’s is actually Men’s size 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I'm not a runner. Use it for walking and love it
customer_reviews.author: samy nimroody

customer_reviews.title: Cut in laces
customer_reviews.text: I received a product with laces cut in two places that could break anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Fredie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. Fits your feet like a glove. Very comfortable. Perfect for running
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Purington

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard for me to find shoes that are comfortable but these are amazing! So lightweight and I get lots of compliments on how cute they are!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate color shown compared to actual
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect a grey colored shoe. It is more purplish in actual and Amazon is not doing anything to correct this. You will be stuck with a different colored shoe since Amazon will not do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A.

customer_reviews.title: Nike shoes rock
customer_reviews.text: Just the most comfortable running shoes ever. They just won’t wear out and the incredible springlike cushioning never seems to decrease. They have as much spring in them since day one.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT S

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe with comfort & support.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is very pleased with the shoe. He not only likes the look but also enjoys the comfort & support it gives him!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Charlifue

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct size
customer_reviews.text: The description states that they are a men's 9.5, but the physical shoes that you receive are actually a men's 12.5
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Durham

customer_reviews.title: It’s not women’s, it’s mens.
customer_reviews.text: This product is listen as women’s and it is a men’s shoe. Very disappointed in the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Wheres my refund?
customer_reviews.text: Returned 15 April. Shoes to narrow, did not fit. Wheres my refund?
customer_reviews.author: Randell L. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were just what she was looking for, but then they were stolen.
customer_reviews.author: j. knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy from seller again
customer_reviews.text: I disbt know I was getting a pair of used shoes. They were dirty. Could have gitten new pair fron Nike
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color not the correct size
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product it was the wrong color the box was torn and the size to small
customer_reviews.author: Martha ruiz

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend the new
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend the new, highly promoted Nike Men's Epic React Flyknit 2018. They make a popping sound (almost like your ankles cracking) when you walk or run. This is a known issue that has not been fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Ritchey S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm hardly a professional
customer_reviews.text: But these sneakers fit me perfectly. I like a snug fit when I run-no sliding around, and that's what I got ordering my normal 11.5 men's. I only run about a half hour 3-4 times a week, so I can't tell you if these are great for a marathon, but exactly what I needed to cushion the impact of running on pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Can I Kick it?

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart in a week
customer_reviews.text: One week of running and already falling apart - see picture
customer_reviews.author: robert buckley rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Best sole feel, look awesome. NOT DURABLE.
customer_reviews.text: Best feeling running shoes as far as sole padding (obviously not compared to Vaporflys, but when compared to similar price point shoes) but not durable at all. These are not gonna hold up for hundreds of miles like Boost ATRs or the HOVR series, but they offer more cushion. I had to return them due to sizing, but picked up another identical pair at a Nike outlet. They are good for once a week long runs, or a few times a week medium runs, but they will wear quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: If you are planning on sneaking up on someone......
customer_reviews.text: don't buy these. With every step comes a little pop sound. Like the sound of snapping gum in your mouth. two weeks after buying these EXPENSIVE shoes the rubber on the ball of my foot area has peeled or come unglued. Had to adhere it back to the shoe. A very poor design other than the looks. Nike seems to be slacking on everything but price on a good portion of their shoes. I love it when companies cut back on quality and raise prices on the same product.
customer_reviews.author: silvanas

customer_reviews.title: FAKE! Avoid, fell apart <6 weeks! Read my comments
customer_reviews.text: FAKE! Avoid these knockoffs. I was SO excited to find these and my rare 12.5 size but they have fallen apart after 6 weeks! I have worn Nike all my life. It helps I live in Beaverton and literally across the street from Nike world HQ! But the employee store I get passes too often rarely has 12.5’a so I took a chance here. The soles started to come OFF, delaminating or something. Again my GF & daughter tease me for my 200+ shoe addiction so I’m not new! I’m so bummed they were perfect fit, comfy & look great. Sadly not Nike. I’ve worn some for years and through the soles but never had them fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: esd6

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: I usually have no problem with Nike's width size. I wear a 10.5 and the width is always good but these shoes are very tight. There are certain sock I can not wear with. I would recommend buying a size up for the added width.
customer_reviews.author: Spock

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a pair of these. I typically wear somewhere between 9.5 and 10, so ordered 10's. Those ended up being too small, so re-ordered 10.5's. Unfortunately, the pair they sent us had a big chunk of mud (I hope it was just mud) on the bottom of the shoe and one of the two pull straps on the heal was torn completely off. Thus, they had taken that pair back, didn't look at them at all, and sent them to us. Obviously, those are on their way back.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: For those who can't tell if it's too large
customer_reviews.text: I wear Nike running shoe size 11 across the board. When I got these, I was afraid they were a half size too big. It turns out, the toe box is just a little larger than most Nike running shoes. I run about a 5k a day in these and they're great. Like running on plushy clouds. As others have said, probably not the best marathon shoe but it's great for everyday runs and exercises
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Nike Brand!!
customer_reviews.text: This product does NOT feel like the Nike brand. I wore them once on a 5 mile walk and they tore up my heel and I haven’t been able to wear them since. Extremely disappointed in these fake Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What you see is NOT what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. The item description clearly says “Men’s”... so I ordered a Men’s 9 as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. A Women’s 9 is what showed up. I had to desperately go out shopping on Christmas Eve to find something else. I would not order again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Hawley D

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Look, But Not Good For Running
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe for everyday wear with jeans and shorts, not for running. They have stretchy uppers, like socks. The laces are more for decoration than function. I love the way they look, but as a long-time runner, I would never use them for running. They do not have adequate support and stability for running. But, they are extremely cool, especially with the blue sole that comes with the thunder grey/black-ocean fog-ashen color. I’ve received tons of compliments on this shoe, even from complete strangers.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Nikes ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of this shoe. I absolutely love them they're the most comfortable & breathable shoes I own. I spend most of the day on my feet and no problems. I did purchase these in a half size larger so I can put some running insoles inside they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NMB

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half a larger down as a lot of people suggested and they fit perfectly. I usually wear an 8.5 and they left blisters on my heels. Otherwise they look great and are very comfortable and breathable .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love most flyknits .....not these
customer_reviews.text: I love the flyknit line however these shoes felt bad. Not sure if I maybe got knockoffs as they felt much smaller and less "comfy" than my other flyknits. I literally had to return these after wearing around the house for 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rick T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super light, the color scheme is good but these are the first ever nike running shoes that constantly give me heel blisters... pretty disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Robles

customer_reviews.title: Some are men’s sizing. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: They say women’s but when my shoes arrived they were clearly men’s sizing. Annoyed. I have to send them back and now my correct size is sold out. Beware some colors are Men’s and you would have to order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: T Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments like crazy, very comfortable. I own a solid blue pair that are 2 yrs old and they're still comfy.
customer_reviews.author: DonnieS

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, not durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of these shoes, but the comfort rapidly deteriorated. At first, they felt amazing. After a few weeks of heavy use, the cushioning and support seemed to wear extremely quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Porinsky

customer_reviews.title: love the shoe, fit exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: love the shoe, fit exactly as expected, delivered in 2 days! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Taber

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit, order half size up.
customer_reviews.text: I will have to try again in half size larger. I did stick with my Ultraboost.
customer_reviews.author: DannyDarko

customer_reviews.title: Great cushioning, but a bit too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioning on this shoe and can imagine it'd be great for running; but a bit too narrow for my foot (so I had to return).
customer_reviews.author: troy.

customer_reviews.title: Very tight/. I ordered my size./ are they supposed to be extremely tight ??
customer_reviews.text: Tight for me. Needs 1/2 size bigger. But the shoes feel great .. Just have to live the socks out. Or don't feet
customer_reviews.author: Pedro J. Aguilar Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This sneakers seems to be of very good quality. It is very comfortable. It appears to be the genuine article.
customer_reviews.author: Brian St Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Run small. Heel blisters within first hour of wear. Willing to order larger size so if they fit willI update
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Newhook

customer_reviews.title: good support for walking
customer_reviews.text: They're a little hard to get on (not having a normal tongue), but the support on the outside of my foot is much better with these than my previous pair of runners.
customer_reviews.author: S. W. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great asphalt shoe
customer_reviews.text: They do run a little narrow, but my long runs have never felt more smooth. Lightweight, tons of energy return, and they breathe better than any shoe I've worn before. I've seen some complaints about blisters on heels, but I haven't experienced that yet, may just be related to the runners' footstrike. 4/5 though, considering getting another pair while they're in stock.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Greatest running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of running shoes ever! Never experienced anything like them. My brother swore by them having his for 7 months and I can now vogue for them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F. Lang

customer_reviews.title: The box look like some fought my shoes
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I'm giving a 2 is because the shoes came used and the box is really trashed and I bought them new but they came used and if your going to buy get them half a size up so I'm 11 but I should have got 11.5 and the sole is creased on both and it had a orange stain
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Has quickly become my go-to running shoe for both comfort & style
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are soft and comfortable. They arrived on time. Worn by 16 year old active boy
customer_reviews.author: specialops007

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a sock
customer_reviews.text: Very supportive. Probably the most comfortable shoe I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad A. Syed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This Nike react foam makes running easy! I'm a larger male and I've always dealt with shin issues. Not anymore. This foam pushes you down the road effortlessly. It's night and day compared to my old shoes.
customer_reviews.author: GHGardener

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate running shoe! My 3rd pair. Probably get 400-500 miles on these before the bounce is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No tongue!
customer_reviews.text: No tongue on this shoe. Elastic top makes it hard to get into. If you have a high arch it’s tight. Light, good cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C Shapero

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this shoe if you're an avid runner.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is too soft for running on asphalt. I run 4 times a week, usually 5 or 6 miles. This shoe causes aches in the bottom of my feet and tendinitis in my legs. It's great for walking and gentle hiking, but it is awful for running. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Haase

customer_reviews.title: Nike should not discontinue this product
customer_reviews.text: Great training shoe with front to back comfort and support, yet very light and wuick
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Tight and right
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks beautiful but it is so damn tight and hard to get on my flipping foot. Should have gotten a half size up....
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Tags do not match.
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of sneakers and found that the tags on them are completely different !!! The size is the same, the serial number too, but the production date is completely different !!! How is this possible ????
customer_reviews.author: Andrii Rudyk

customer_reviews.title: Brand New? Doesn't seem like it.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping package wasn't damage but the sneakers were all dirty. The were supposed to be brand new. Only reason I'm giving two stars is because shipping speed was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy M.

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product, so disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The product is counterfeit, it is unbelievable that an Amazon store offers counterfeit products, it looks similar than the original but the logos are incomplete as many of other customers had posted pictures and I paid as they were original
customer_reviews.author: Roldan Caceres

customer_reviews.title: a little snug but a very nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have went half a size larger than normal. Overall I really like this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: A Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe, exceptional value!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Looks great. Excellent for running miles on hard asphalt or concrete. And did I say they look great. They wear like iron,( I’ve had several pairs in other colors)
customer_reviews.author: David A. McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: These shoes suck.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Most expensive sneaker I ever bought. Destroyed the back of my heel. Then the bottom of the shoes deteriorated like cotton candy. $60 nikes are 3x better. Will just buy 3 pairs of those for the price of these.
customer_reviews.author: Confused

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light. Great for running or walking on pavement
customer_reviews.author: Michael Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases for my GYM. Very light. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: Nike shoes
customer_reviews.text: Used pair of shoes someone wore them and worn the sole out
customer_reviews.author: trailblazer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing a little off
customer_reviews.text: Very good cushioning. For me sizing a little off. One size too tight the next size a little too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Elgin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fit, design
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my adult son and he is extremely picky about comfort and design. I take him at his word - these shoes really worked for quality, comfort and style!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Runners
customer_reviews.text: Hi, Great runners, very comfortable, very light. BUT The shoes wear very quickly so if value is important deduct ONE STAR
customer_reviews.author: JonT

customer_reviews.title: Below Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Product is below expectations. Too soft. size 9 is about 1/2 point less than a real size 9. For the price, $125 you can get a better product, i.e Adidas
customer_reviews.author: GUILLERMO BANFI

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Shoe very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice snug fitting shoe. It’s a little snug but my feet swell sometimes and this shoe allows for the flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Webb Smith-Lamberth

customer_reviews.title: Cutting edge for professional football players
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy on/off Might slip a little on steep hills
customer_reviews.author: Rex Mmm

customer_reviews.title: My 17yr old son loves them and hes picky
customer_reviews.text: My 17 yr old loves these shoes he loves how comfortable they are. He says I should get a pair I've got horrible back pain. He thinks these would help.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Ames

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and fit well, must keep them clean with the white.
customer_reviews.author: SMace

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👌
customer_reviews.text: They comfortable feels like it squeezes my foot though more then the alphabounce shoes. Kinda wished those Nike shoes that iv purchased had a little space for my toes to move a little .
customer_reviews.author: julian montes

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Son had gotten a pair 6 months ago and this is his second pair. Used for running and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Balocco

customer_reviews.title: These Shoes Slap
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes what a shoe. Looks great, fits as expected, and really helps spring you forward on those long 10+ mile runs. I’d recommend these shoes to anyone training for distance races (half marathons, 25k’s, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product was not as advertised, wrong color, returned it but took a long time to get reimbursed
customer_reviews.author: Thorarinn Kristjansson

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: Will see how they hold up but very happy so far. Great to have a 12.5 size too as in past Nike went from 12 to 13.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coley Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My son runs cross country and these are the only shoes he will wear. Heard style is now discontinued - good luck finding them! Hopefully Nike will bring them back.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort,use for running, check daily to see if amazon has any more colors in my size, don't trust eBay or stock x
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for $100
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for running! I run half marathons and these are my favorite for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seanykakes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I enjoy them so much . Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Avi Petel

customer_reviews.title: Error when ordering a size 11
customer_reviews.text: There's a glitch in ordering a size 11 so be careful!! It ends up listing it as a size 10, no matter what you do. We've ordered twice and both times got a size 10. It doesn't do this for any other size.
customer_reviews.author: David Blahnik

customer_reviews.title: Nice quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: They are tight but true to size. I’ve been wearing them around the house to loosen them up and it’s working. Looking forward to my first run.
customer_reviews.author: asmith

customer_reviews.title: great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the feel and how much support you get. Great for a long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe/ pay attention to size
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest ordering a half size up. But the shoes are excellent and comfortable once I figure out the size thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Leary

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy souls
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked very nice and feel good, the souls are wearing out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER C.

customer_reviews.title: Beware counterfeit shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit shoes. They wore in less then 2 months!!! And as you can tell it says Nike nowhere it’s blacked out!!
customer_reviews.author: Uriel

customer_reviews.title: I looked everywhere for this colorway!
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for this colorway! Excellent shoe fits great, comfortable and looks amazing! Shipped quicker than expected, that’s always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use it for physical therapy and casual wear very pleased with use and delivery. Amazon makes you never want to go to the mall again.
customer_reviews.author: dustin rice

customer_reviews.title: nice and comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: nice, great and comfortable shoe like what i expected, i wear it for running. i haven't try to run long distance yet.... but look like it will be good.
customer_reviews.author: Agus suwandono

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and comfortable shoe for walking. Yes, a bit expensive but worth the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes so much. They run a little small. Would recommend going .5 up or larger
customer_reviews.author: B. K

customer_reviews.title: Best kicks ever
customer_reviews.text: Got them today, kicks looks sexy af, it even arrived a few days early :)
customer_reviews.author: Tong Seng Hau

customer_reviews.title: Amazing running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing running shoes! It takes an extra minute to put them on and lace up because they fit tight but feel amazing while running.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Mincey

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Obviously not Nike flyknits. Would NEVER order from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Epic React Flyknit Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Nike Men's EPIC REACT FLYKNIT, BLACK/WHITE-RED ORBIT
feature_bullets: Flyknit Upper Construction Wraps The Foot For A Secure, Supportive Fit
Elastic Yarns In The Upper Create An Engineered Fit And Superior Comfort
Nike React Foam Technology Provides A Soft And Responsive Ride"
